sentence.Network_en: An autotrophic, unicellular, green alga presents the minimum of specialization.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个自养的单细胞绿藻表现最小程度的特化.

sentence.Network_en: That's why no reptile degenerates to a blue green alga.
sentence.Network_cn: 为什么中间没有发生过爬行动物又退化回蓝藻的现象?

sentence.Network_en: Spiral alga has a slimming effect, it is popular with many women.
sentence.Network_cn: 螺旋藻有减肥的作用, 受到许多女士的欢迎.
